name: bakery-1
headline: Scarecrows!
article: Farmers have awoken to a shock, as their scarecrows have up and started walking about! They have become territorial of their fields to anyone trying to harvest the produce. Local monster experts recommend "Burning it all down first chance you get."

outcomes.customDescription: <color=#820000ff>5 Threat per farm until this is resolved</color>

nextEvent.name: bakery-2
nextEvent.headline: Let Them Eat Cake
nextEvent.article: A kindly old woman appears "I heard you're needing food darling, I offer you this delicious cake, if you just let me in."

nextEvent.name: bakery-3
nextEvent.headline: The Flower Fields
nextEvent.article: A beacon of hope for our farmers has come today, as we have retrieved an ancient map that looks to mark the distant homeland of these hazardous scarecrows. While the translation is unclear, it goes on to describe a 'field of flowers', which could be a cure to this curse!

outcomes.customDescription: Our scarecrow dilemma may finally be over...

quest.name: bakery-quest
quest.title: Find the Flower Fields
quest.description: The scarecrows homeland  are the only thing stopping us from

completedEvent.name: bakery-4
completedEvent.headline: The Flour Fields
completedEvent.article: Our adventurers returned from their quest to rid us of the scarecrow plague, but with bundles of grain, not miracle flowers, in hand. The scent of the delicious grain has calmed the scarecrows, and they agree to go back to their homeland and leave us be. As a parting gift, they left 'these weird stuffed dolls on sticks' in their place.

outcomes.customDescription: We've decided to grind up all this grain to make bread.
"I'm glad you are so welcoming, I hope to see you all soon..." the woman exclaims before bursting into a pile of delicious cakes.
"I hope you all starve!" the woman shrieks as she bursts into a pile of rotten, inedible, cake.

name: enchanter-1
headline: Traveling Merchant Inbound
article: Our scouts have reported to us that the traveling merchant has picked up an intriguing new item, and is on the way to our town now.

nextEvent.name: enchanter-2
nextEvent.headline: Merchant Real Close Now
nextEvent.article: Our scouts keep hyping up, whatever it is, must be worth it.

outcomes.customDescription: Hope you've been hoarding that wealth...

nextEvent.name: enchanter-3
nextEvent.headline: Travelling Merchant Comes to Town
nextEvent.article: After days of anticipation, the merchant has finally arrived. "I've just got the one item on me today, but it's a good find!"

outcomes.customDescription: "Deciphering the scrolls revealed them to be ."
"Ahh what a shame, I was looking forward to this payday."

name: plaza-1
headline: Mime Requests Rescue
article: A silent stranger walked into the guild hall today with a request. After a long drawn out game of charades with the mime it was understood that he is part of a circus troupe of street performers. However, his entire troupe has been kidnapped, with only him escaping... silently. Rescue the troupe and we may have a performance in town!

quest.name: plaza-quest
quest.title: Rescue the Circus
quest.description: The troupe has been kidnapped by raiders!

completedEvent.name: plaza-2
completedEvent.headline: The Day the Circus Came to Town
completedEvent.article: Adventures returned after a circus rescue with their cart, but what looked like no performers. This was until one by one, and improbable amount stepped out, and rejoined the grateful mime. The circus likes to perform on the streets and requests building public areas.

outcomes.customDescription: They've given us some designs for a public performance space.
